org.hibernate.validator

接口 HibernateValidatorFactory

  • 所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable, javax.validation.ValidatorFactory
    所有已知实现类:
    ValidatorFactoryImpl

    public interface HibernateValidatorFactory
extends javax.validation.ValidatorFactory
    Provides Hibernate Validator extensions to ValidatorFactory.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ScriptEvaluatorFactory getScriptEvaluatorFactory()
      Returns the factory responsible for creating ScriptEvaluators used to evaluate script expressions of ScriptAssert and ParameterScriptAssert constraints.
      Duration getTemporalValidationTolerance()
      Returns the temporal validation tolerance i.e. the acceptable margin of error when comparing date/time in temporal constraints.
      HibernateValidatorContext usingContext()
      Returns a context for validator configuration via options from the Bean Validation API as well as specific ones from Hibernate Validator.

      • 从接口继承的方法 javax.validation.ValidatorFactory

        close, getClockProvider, getConstraintValidatorFactory, getMessageInterpolator, getParameterNameProvider, getTraversableResolver, getValidator, unwrap

    • 方法详细资料

      • getScriptEvaluatorFactory

        @Incubating
ScriptEvaluatorFactory getScriptEvaluatorFactory()
        Returns the factory responsible for creating ScriptEvaluators used to evaluate script expressions of ScriptAssert and ParameterScriptAssert constraints.
        返回:
        a ScriptEvaluatorFactory instance
        从以下版本开始:
        6.0.3

      • getTemporalValidationTolerance

        @Incubating
Duration getTemporalValidationTolerance()
        Returns the temporal validation tolerance i.e. the acceptable margin of error when comparing date/time in temporal constraints.
        返回:
        the tolerance
        从以下版本开始:
        6.0.5

      • usingContext

        HibernateValidatorContext usingContext()
        Returns a context for validator configuration via options from the Bean Validation API as well as specific ones from Hibernate Validator.
        指定者:
        usingContext 在接口中 javax.validation.ValidatorFactory
        返回:
        A context for validator configuration.
